title: Scooped Up by an S-Rank Adventurer!
overview: Lloyd is a white mage who was unexpectedly banished from a hero's party. Lost and uncertain, he crosses paths with an S-rank adventurer party in need of a white mage, and joins them. Little did anyone know, the hero's party would fall apart and Lloyd would rise to fame. This is a story about an unmatched support magic user, who believes himself to be ordinary, becoming an unstoppable adventurer.
